content: the third in the hygge woodland critters series i wrote for underground crafter this hygge squirrel uses a fun method for curving his bushy tail and give it that extra oomph i think he is the perfect complement to the owl and hedgehog don t you pattern is written in us terms using craft yarn council abbreviations intermediate pattern knowledge needed of chains chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increases and decreases knowledge of amigurumi part attachment is recommended supplies red heart soft worsted weight yarn 100% acrylic 256 yds / 5 oz / 141 g 1 ball #7933 wheat mc < 1 ball 20 yds #e728 cocoa ac1 red heart hygge bulky yarn 70% acrylic 30% nylon 132 yds / 5 oz / 141 g 1 ball #e869 latte ac2 g 4 25 mm crochet hook two 15 mm brown safety eyes polyfil stuffing tapestry needle straight pins stitch markers if desired measurements 7 tall x 4 5 wide x 4 5 deep when made with worsted weight yarn gauge gauge is not important for amigurumi be sure to use the same hook throughout to ensure proportional size for more help with part attachment see www hookedbykati com 5 tips for perfect amigurumi part attachment
